Bluetooth is not available, shutting down! Bluetooth has not been enabled, shutting down! his device does not have Bluetooth Low Energy, shutting down! GPS is off. 
For recent versions of Android, 
this needs to be connected to
searching for BlueTooth devices.
The application will be terminated!
Please enable GPS and run again. This is necessary to be done only once. GPS required to find Bluetooth devices, please enable this and try again. Unable to initialize the BLE UART service, shutting down! The Bluetooth device was disconnected Connecting to device ... Scanning the device ... Bluetooth device has not connected Waiting Bluetooth response ... Null BLE device Bluetooth Device doesn't support UART. Disconnecting BLE UART Service not active
Bluetooth device was shutdown, due to having reached maximum time of inactivity (%d s.)
EspApp Initializing app ... Bluetooth Â® Low Energy Connecting... Please turn on the device Device: Connection aborted: Connecting to device: Connected to device: Device connected - firmware Bluetooth device has been turned off--> Try connection again No response from Bluetooth device Sending message Bluetooth Send Press again to exit Sair Loading app ... Warning!
An exception has occurred in app: Close app Refresh Cancel MM-dd-yy hh:mm aa hh:mm:ss aa Received invalid message via Bluetooth. Attention: the battery is very low. Recommended connect charger. Sending feedback An exception has occurred in app Informations Show informations about ESP32 device connected Terminal BLE Terminal to send or see message BLE Settings Show settings of this App EspApp Informations Terminal BLE demonstration Not allowed in demonstration Confirm exit app ? Yes No Repeat C-Connection D-Disconn R-Receive S-Send O-Other Stop Repeated sends now Empty data For repeat, only echo messages by terminal Repeat sends is stopped Echo test *** Repeats(send/receive) p/sec.: |Chg Bat Ext Attention: Low battery on BLE device!
